mapper.select: SELECT A.CRT_DT as createDate, A.UPD_DT as updateDate, A.USR_ID as userId, B.PRDT_NM as name, A.PRDT_NO as productId, A.BUY_HIST_NO as buyId, A.BUY_CNT as cnt, A.BUY_AMNT as tntPrice FROM TB_USER_BUY_HISTORY A, TB_PRODUCT B WHERE USR_ID=#{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.PRDT_NO = B.PRDT_NO ORDER BY BUYID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET USR_NM =#{map.user.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USR_EML=#{map.user.email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USR_PSSWRD=#{map.user.password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USR_BIR=#{map.user.birth, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, USR_GD=#{map.user.gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USR_PN=#{map.user.phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALT=#{map.user.salt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_DT=SYSDATE WHERE USR_ID =#{map.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
